database.name: VIEW CEEI_EDOCUMENTS
database.view: SELECT pdf.ad_record_id AS c_invoice, COALESCE(to_char(pdf.name), to_char('ND')) AS pdf_name, COALESCE(to_char(pdf.path), to_char('ND')) AS pdf_path, COALESCE(to_char(xm.name), to_char('ND')) AS xml_name, COALESCE(to_char(xm.path), to_char('ND')) AS xml_path FROM ceei_edocuments_pdf pdf LEFT JOIN ceei_edocuments_xml xm ON xm.ad_record_id = pdf.ad_record_id
